Title: Co-Founder
Description: Welcome to a place where cool ideas are seeded, nurtured and harvested. Where good people come together to grow. This is A.C.T. Let’s jump on the tractor and start harvesting.

Title: Photographer
Description: My aim is to create images with a connection. It doesn’t have to be a great pose, beautiful lighting or the best equipment; just connection with the lens, the situation they are in, a person or even a thought.   I am currently working on a project capturing people in their homes. I want to create stunning images of people ‘just hanging out’ frozen in the most comfortable of arenas. I want picture of mum making a cake with their first born, families running in the sprinkler on a hot day or even sitting in a favourite cuddle couch. Photography is more than just a smiling family, it’s about a split second in your life when nothing mattered but that moment.

Title: Manager, Brand and Comms
Description: Live music, backstage and promotional photography.

Title: Senior Advisor
Description: Helping to build safe, caring and connected communities by helping to provide all the tools, resources and services to support them. I strive to use my skills in storytelling, creativity and innovation to make this a reality.

Title: Manager
Description: I manage all Branding and Communications for Orange Sky Australia. Everything I do has a focus on upholding the Orange Sky values with a mission to Positively Connect Communities.

Title: Editor
Description: WordsImagesMusic was created by a photographer and a writer who want to dig deep into Brisbane’s creativity, who want to go past the here and now, the latest single, the new album, last night’s show.   We tell the stories of music and music in Brisbane; the stories of and by the creative community where the people in, on, and near the action tell the stories themselves; where the community teaches and learns, supports and collaborates, grows and profits.

Title: Senior Advisor
Description: Program development, advisory, evaluation, training and support.

Title: Editor
Description: Supporting music and events in the Brisbane area.

Title: Photographer
Description: Live music and general promotion photographer

Title: Housing and Homelessness Project Officer
Description: Find accommodaiton solutions for offenders returning from prison.

Title: Principal Advisor
Description: Evaluation of Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander offending programs
